info.title: Greip API
info.description: This documentation provides a comprehensive guide on how to utilize the Greip API, including detailed explanations of API methods, available options, and other features to optimize your API usage.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
The `params` command can be used to specify the required modules you want to get in the response.

Expected values: `security`, `currency`, `timezone`, `location`, and/or `device`.

Sample value: `security,timezone,currency`.

Expected values: any name that can be used as a function name in Javascript, e.g: `myFunctionName`.

get.description: By using this module, you can easily fetch the complete data associated with a debit/credit card, including its `type` (debit or credit), `schema` (Visa, Mastercard, etc.), `brand` (gold, platinum, etc.), `bank` details, and more.
